channel.title: [562] how to add custom crowns [562] help please!
channel.description: [size=24pt]How do you add custom crowns to a 562?? Please don't say "Go into class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java" because that is for 317's, not 562.. Also, have no sprites folder seeing as this is a 562..[/size]

item.title: [562] how to add custom crowns [562] help please!
item.dc:creator: @AustenGreen AustenGreen

noobs are ftw:

im going to try2 right now
ill get back to you on this

FEEDBACK = FAIL!!! hah
